title: SMC_GVar_Type (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_GVar_Type :
The supported types of variables, formal subprogram parameters, and
expressions in G-Code.
Note that there is only one numeric type, LREAL.  All  numeric values
are represented as an LREAL.
See
SMC_NC_GArgumentValue
, a union that holds the value of
a variable or expression.
Attributes:
qualified_only

rows.Name: T_LREAL
rows.Comment: Numeric type (both integer and floating point types)

rows.Name: T_OTHER
rows.Comment:
Other type, used e.g. for M-Function parameters and
for functions that accept and return arbitrary types.
